The Jerky Beats - Play Songs For Lovers

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 21, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
The band's chosen moniker pretty much sums them up. Short, choppy bursts of fuzzed out bass and robotically precise drums provide a platform for Mild Phil Chokeword to blurt bursts of adult adolescence.Get it. Get fucked. ...PLAY SONGS FOR LOVERS
